name.name: FASST – fMRI Artefact rejection and Sleep Scoring Toolbox

software.description:
FASST is an EEG toolbox developed to help users with 3 specific types of data and problems: simulatenous EEG-fMRI recording, continuous EEG scoring (e.g. sleep) and handling (visualisation, cutting, power spectrum, etc.) multi-channel recording of spontaneous EEG.
The toolbox is written in Matlab and is specifically compatible with the BrainAmp family of EEG recorders (from BrainProducts GmbH) Three other data formats are now also supported: the edf 'European Data Format', exported raw-EGI data (from Electrical Geodesics, Inc.) and the BCI2000 format.The results are directly compatible with SPM8 and are saved with SPM8 EEG data format.
